text: John Henry Coates (26 January 1945 â€“ 9 May 2022) was an Australian mathematician. He was a professor at the University of Cambridge from 1986 to 2012. He was born in New South Wales, Australia. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2008. Coates died on 9 May 2022 in Cambridge, England at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Australian academics Category:Australian mathematicians Category:Writers from New South Wales Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: John H. Coates
